overview: Young Israeli, Mark Nill, arrives in the German resort of Ravensburg looking for a bit of summer fun – and what does he discover? A town that’s filled to the rafters with the hottest and horniest male totty around, all of which is just gagging for the next damn fuck. Featuring STAXUS exclusives Rudy Valentino, Tim Law and Dick Casey, this is one dream vacation that’s guaranteed to have you tugging on your dick and spewing copious amounts of cum before the journey home!
title: German Sex Holiday 1
